commit.message:
docs(v1.2): create comprehensive PRD for enhancement release

Created detailed v1.2 Product Requirements Document focused on quality
improvements, performance optimization, and integration expansion.

## v1.2 Scope - Enhancement Release
Building on v1.1 success (99.8% test pass rate, all 13 features operational)

### Quality & Testing (ENHANCE-001)
- Increase backend test coverage 84% → 90%
- Fix 5 non-critical test failures
- Achieve 100% test pass rate (3,000/3,000)
- Maintain frontend coverage ≥ 85%

### Performance Optimization (PERF-001-004)
- Frontend bundle optimization (20-30% reduction)
- Backend API response time < 500ms (p95)
- Lighthouse scores: Performance 90%+, Accessibility 95%+
- Database connection pooling tuning

### OAuth Integrations (INT-001-003)
- QuickBooks OAuth integration (unlock US market)
- Sage OAuth integration (unlock UK market - 30% of audience)
- NetSuite OAuth integration (unlock enterprise - 40% of deals)
- All with ≥85% test coverage, error handling, webhooks

### Marketing Content (MARK-009-012)
- 10 SEO-optimized blog posts (1,500-2,000 words each)
- 3 customer case studies
- 3 competitive comparison pages
- 5 product demo video scripts

## Implementation Approach
- Methodology: BMAD Method Enterprise + TDD (RED-GREEN-REFACTOR)
- Duration: 60-80 hours (2-3 weeks)
- Epic Breakdown: 6 epics, 70-90 stories
- Coverage Gates: Backend ≥90%, Frontend ≥85%

## Success Criteria
✅ 100% test pass rate (all 3,000 tests)
✅ Lighthouse Performance ≥90%
✅ All 3 OAuth integrations operational
✅ Marketing content driving organic traffic

## Next Steps
1. Epic & Story Breakdown (/bmad:bmm:workflows:create-epics-and-stories)
2. Sprint Planning (/bmad:bmm:workflows:sprint-planning)
3. Begin Implementation (TDD cycle)

## References
- V1.1 Completion Report: docs/V1.1-COMPLETION-REPORT.md
- Maintenance Handoff: docs/MAINTENANCE-HANDOFF.md
- Original PRD: docs/PRD.md (v1.0)

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
